result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Taylar Asheton Ray

records.addlTxt: to Judge Rood from Atty. Forehand re missed court earlier this date

10:38 AM Attorney Erika L Bierma appeared by video for Taylar Asheton Ray. State doesn't appear. Attorney Bierma indicates that an offer has been sent. Court advises Attorney Bierma to speak with the DA office and when scheduling is needed DA office can contact the JA for Judge Rood.

for Leave to File Additional Motions

Per Judge Rood: Request Granted.
Status conference on June 20, 2022 at 10:30 am.

10:37 AM Defendant Taylar Asheton Ray appeared by video.  Attorney Erika L Bierma appeared by video for Taylar Asheton Ray.  Attorney Amy Elizabeth Forehand appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Bierma stands mute on behalf of TR.
Status hearing scheduled for June 20, 2022 at 10:30 am.

Adjustment Number: 22A 004250,
Payable Number: 65587,
Receipt Number: 22R 001799,
Amount: $20.00
Adjourned initial appearance on April 25, 2022 at 10:30 am.

02:57 PM Defendant Taylar Asheton Ray appeared by video means. Prosecuting Atty Amy Elizabeth Forehand appeared for State of Wisconsin. TR has received the complaint and asks the court to read the complaint. Court speaks about counsel. TR is working on getting an attorney.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 25, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Initial appearance on March 7, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

AMENDED:
Defendant shall have no contact directly or indirectly with Randy Wahl or that person's residence and is not to go to 512 Stori Dr. Richland Center, WI 53581.

Defendant shall not possess or consume any alcohol and shall submit to evidentiary testing of blood, breath or urine, on demand of law enforcement, to monitor compliance. No entry into bars, taverns, or any establishment of which the primary purpose is the sale of alcohol, Phoenix Center included. AMENDED 02/18/22: TR may be at the Press Box only when working and may possess but no consume any alcohol

records.descr: Application for specific judicial assign approved

records.addlTxt: 01:15 PM TR appears by phone. Attorney Forehand appears by video. Attorney Forehand is working on the complaint. TR ask that her bond be modified to allow her to be at the Press Box for work. No objection from the state. Court amends bond to add that  she may be at the Press Box only when working and may possess but no consume any alcohol.
